ROCCATt® Kain 200 AIMO

The Game-Changing

Titan Switch

Vulcan 121 AIMO

The Titan Switch is equal parts mechanics and firmware. On the mechanical side, it features a host of design evolutions that fill every key stroke with reliability and consistency.

∅

Robost Build Quality

A strong aluminium back plate, macro keys with functions
saved to on-board memory, a multimedia zone and Led indicators
- the Vulcan has got it all. Easy to use, easy to clean and
long-lasting. Our most complete mechanical keyboard yet.
